output.final_deliverable: The capital city of Australia is Canberra. (Authoritative source: National Capital Authority — https://www.nca.gov.au/education/canberras-history/canberra-seat-government)
output.action_summary: The National Capital Authority, an official Australian government body, identifies Canberra as Australia’s national capital: https://www.nca.gov.au/education/canberras-history/canberra-seat-government.

result.query: What is the capital of Australia? Canberra capital of Australia reputable sources
result.intent: determine the capital city of Australia from reliable reference sources (Encyclopaedia Britannica, CIA World Factbook, etc.)

results.title: Canberra | History, Map, Population, Climate, & Facts | Britannica
results.description: 12, 2026, 6:04 AM ET (AP) Show less · Canberra, federal capital of the Commonwealth of Australia. It occupies part of the Australian Capital Territory (ACT), in southeastern Australia, and is about 150 miles (240 km) southwest of Sydney.

results.title: Canberra - Wikipedia
results.description: European settlement commenced in the first half of the 19th century, evidenced by surviving landmarks such as St John's Anglican Church and Blundells Cottage. On 1 January 1901, federation of the colonies of Australia was achieved. The capital city was founded and formally named as Canberra in 1913.

results.title: The Siting and Naming of Canberra | National Capital Authority
results.description: In October 1908, the Seat of Government Bill, confirming Yass-Canberra as the nation’s capital, was passed by the Parliament. Surveyor Charles Scrivener was instructed to find an attractive setting for ‘a beautiful city … embracing distinctive features … worthy of the object, not only for the present but for all time’. In a bold move, the Government conducted an international competition for the design of the capital which entrants were told would be the ‘official and social centre of Australia’.

results.title: Australian Capital Territory (Canberra) | Study Australia
results.description: As Australia's capital, Canberra boasts some of the country’s preeminent educational and cultural institutions. The ACT is known for being welcoming, inclusive and liveable. Its location offers a unique Australian experience, and provides easy access to national parks, Australia's biggest ...

results.title: Australian Capital Territory - Wikipedia
results.description: The Australian Capital Territory (ACT), known as the Federal Capital Territory until 1938, is an internal territory of Australia. Canberra, the capital city of Australia, is situated within the territory, and is the territory's primate city. ...

results.description: Canberra, Australia’s National Capital, has a unique purpose, setting, character and symbolism, and it’s important we make sure it continues to do so.

results.description: After 7 years of debate, the Australian Parliament finally agreed on the Yass-Canberra district as the site for Australia’s national capital. The issue of the seat of government had been considered but not resolved in the discussions leading ...
